title: Smart Data Models - Urban mobility PublicTransportation schema

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be PublicTransportation

contractingAuthority.description: Property. Name of the contracting authority of the public transportation

contractingCompany.description: Property. Name of the contracting company responsible for the exploitation of the service

installationMode.description: Property. Location relative to the ground reference

locationGTFS.description: Property. Location of all stations from a GTFS file. Possibly replaced by location XXX

locationType.description: Property. Type of location of the public transportation stations

frequency.description: Property. Frequency of public transportation per hour. Units:'times/hour'

serviceHours.description: Property. Number of hours of service per day. Units:'Hours service / day'

pricingAverage.description: Property. Average price of public transportation

numberTrips.description: Property. Number of daily public transportation trips

stopCode.description: Property. Identifier/code of the public transport stops

typesTransportation.description: Property. List of public transportation available

routes.description: Property. List of routes covered with public transportation
